programme.title: Third parties
programme.short_synopsis: Does the 'broken' nature of American politics necessitate a three party system?
programme.medium_synopsis: Senator Bill Bradley's decision to not run for re-election to the Senate, the 'broken' nature of American politics and the role of a third political party.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
